channel.title: Cant make a server on a Vista Laptop?
channel.description:
For some reson my laptop wont let me run a server, no matter what I do. Ive done it before, but I just want some help. If someone could please contact me via MSN, I will tell you exactly whats wrong and how to help me. Please only people who know how to make servers well and have done it before, contact me. Thanks.
MSN - okiaztek@hotmail.com

item.title: Cant make a server on a Vista Laptop?
item.dc:creator: @Thrasher_Alpha Thrasher Alpha
item.description:
@Thrasher_Alpha wrote:

[quote=“King Lingerz, post:2, topic:251807”][quote author=Thrasher Alpha link=topic=332438.msg2593497#msg2593497 date=1229885946]
If someone could please contact me via MSN, I will tell you exactly whats wrong and how to help me.
[/quote]

Why can’t you just tell us what’s wrong WITHOUT making us contact you?

If you know how we can help you, doesn’t that mean you can sort it out yourself? Or did you mean something else?

Be more clear please? :)[/quote]

Im on a laptop behind a router. I have hosted before, but on a computer with no firewalls and no router. I have no idea whats wrong and ive tried everything, I want you to contact me via MSN so I can go through that one feature where you can view my computer and controll everything yourself to help me get this sorted out. I think its called remote control?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 21, 2008, 01:42:10 pm[/size][hr]So can anyone help?

Read full topic
item.source: Cant make a server on a Vista Laptop?
